brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts images of communications devices, including a handheld device, cell phone, and laptop communicating across the world. The caption states: "Intelligent networks are bringing the world together. The human network is everywhere."
Image 1 text: Intelligent networks allow handheld devices to receive news and e-mails and to send text.
Image 2 text: Videoconferencing around the globe is in the palm of your hand.
Image 3 text: Online gaming connects thousands of people seamlessly.
Image 4 text: Phones connect globally to share voice, text, and images.
